mapper.select: SELECT RESERVE_HISTORY.*, ROOM.ROOM_NAME, BUILDING.BUILD_NAME FROM RESERVE_HISTORY, ROOM, BUILDING WHERE TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL) AND RESERVE_HISTORY.ROOM_NO = ROOM.ROOM_NO AND ROOM.BUILD_NO = BUILDING.BUILD_NO AND RESERVE_HISTORY.RESERVE_EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT RESERVE_HISTORY.*, EMPLOYEE.EMP_NAME, ROOM.ROOM_NAME FROM RESERVE_HISTORY, EMPLOYEE, ROOM WHERE RESERVE_HISTORY.RESERVE_EMP_NO = EMPLOYEE.EMP_NO AND RESERVE_HISTORY.ROOM_NO = ROOM.ROOM_NO AND RESERVE_HISTORY.RESERVE_EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT RESERVE_HISTORY.*, ROOM.ROOM_NAME, BUILDING.BUILD_NAME FROM RESERVE_HISTORY, ROOM, BUILDING WHERE TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL) AND RESERVE_HISTORY.ROOM_NO = ROOM.ROOM_NO AND ROOM.BUILD_NO = BUILDING.BUILD_NO AND RESERVE_HISTORY.RESERVE_EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND (((TO_DATE (#{timeSelectStart})<= start_date AND start_date <= TO_DATE (#{timeSelectEnd})) OR (TO_DATE (#{timeSelectStart})<= end_date AND end_date <= TO_DATE (#{timeSelectEnd}))))
